divs: Sighting Detailsi was at work at met hospital,windsor, ont.,western campus, around 1 in the morning and i noticed the ufo out the hospital window, 4th floor. i called in 2 other nurses and they witnessed it also, as well as some patients. it seemed to drift slowly above the detroit river and then it stopped for a few minutes and then it slowly hovered away heading towards detroit area. it looked like a typical ufo right from the beginning. it was saucer shaped with a dome on top and a red revolving light underneath. we were all stunned by it and stood watching it for a while. it just slowly drifted away out of sight over time. it was also near the ambassador bridge (very busy international crossing) so there must have been a lot of other people that seen it as well. i would be interested in knowing if any others reported it also.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Windsor
There were no other sightings in Windsor on or around July 29th 2005
Summary: a typical flying saucer with a dome and circling red light drifted and hovered over windsor and detroit area.
